column4: The Americans certainly know how to cook steak and cook it the way you want it. Mouth watering, fresh, & full of flavor. We had a great meal with great service.

The cozy ambience, large size of the steaks, and wonderful service would have made for a great evening. Sadly, my ribeye had poor texture, was very dry, not very tender, and probably needed a large dose of salt to bring out any flavor. Very disappointing.
We celebrated my husband birthday and had an awesome steak dinner. Accompanied by great drinks, delicious octopus appetizer and tres leches yummy dessert. Will definitely go back.
If you really want steak - it is right place. Very calm and nice atmosphere. Service was excellent! Everthing was very authentic.

column3: The Ribeye was spot on! Service
column4: The Ribeye was spot on! Service was excellent. Was very satisfied with our dining experience. Don‚Äôt pass this place up.
Loved our steaks but have never been asked by the manager to please leave in 6 mins. Maybe it was because out of the 6 of us only 2 were drinking.
Had a tasty steak with a glass of wine. The meat was really good and I warmly recommend this restaurant.
Great place to eat! Wife and I stopped in before a play. Told them it was my wife‚Äôs birthday and they all sang happy birthday. Will go back next time we‚Äôre in the city

Holy...shi..When you eat here. You are just simply happy after you eat the food, it is so good. The food and the service is excellent. Know something about the meat what they serving. Because they make everything perfect. Also the drinks are good...

We went for my boyfriend‚Äôs birthday and it ended up being the best steak we‚Äôve ever had! We split the 50 oz Porterhouse, it was cooked to perfection! The fresh grated horseradish on top was a nice touch too. We definitely will be returning soon!

column3: Best Steakhouse in New York City
column4: The New York strip steak was served on a hot plate with fresh shaved horseradish melted on top. Amazing flavor. Definitely one of the best steaks I‚Äôve ever had!
Visited for my wife's 40th birthday. Outstanding food and service. huge cuts, recommend sharing a steak.
Excellent meal, great atmosphere!! Impeccable service. Definitely a favorite, Staff was very friendly and helpful. Went above and beyond for us.
Let me tell you honey, Tim was the BEST New York bartender I‚Äôve ever had - sweet, friendly and hospitable! And I‚Äôve lived in New York for 5 years!
Love this place! The steak is amazing and make sure to sit at the bar with Tim the bartender, he is so personable and humorous. A breathe of fresh air in the hustle of NYC!
K Rico is consistently my favorite place for Brunch. Not too slammed but delicious. And the margs!!!
Great service. Wonderful food and staff. Go visit because you will not regret it. Such a wonderful food exsperience
Amazing! Super dinner. Highly recommend the Porterhouse. Serves 3 people. Fantastic night. Sides could be not so little.

column3: Gold quality steak and silver service
column4: Fantastic food and attentive service for a wonderful 40th birthday meal. Warm welcome, silver service standards, knowledgeable waiters, simply amazing steaks and cheesecake. Really nice touch with owner Tommy saying hi and the waiters singing happy birthday. The best steak I‚Äôve ever had!!
Excellent fresh food and very quick service, highly recommended ! Easy to make an online reservation.

Probably the best meal and value we had while in NYC. Everything was amazing from the service to the food. The special steak was extremely flavorful, the mussels app was phenomenal, and the sides were just as perfect. Do not hesitate to eat here.

column3: Fantastic Steak on a Cold Night
column4: The fillet was wonderful as well as the empanadas and you must try the Strawberry Salad. The service and atmosphere were superb.
Great service! Best food we ate in NY! Owner Tommy followed us up in an amazingly unique way! Can recommend anyone going to NY and have a meal here! We will come back next time!

column3: This is by far the best steakhouse
column4: This is by far the best steakhouse ever. My ribeye was cooked to perfection and so tasty. The staff were amazing and super attentive they even set a place for my nieces American girl doll. I will definitely be back
Really enjoyed our meal here. Steak was delicious. Biggest baked potato I‚Äôve ever seen. Lots of different dips and owner was really nice. Introduced himself and had a chat
50oz porterhouse was perfectly cooked and probably the best steak I‚Äôve ever had. Service was good, food excellent. Thank you for a great meal!

column3: We loved our brunch at K Rico!
column4: We loved our brunch at K Rico! The steak was perfectly cooked. Super fun and friendly staff that ensured we had a great time! We‚Äôll be back!

column3: Best steak I have EVER had
column4: Yes it is expensive, but it is certainly worth it, I went for the 22 oz Ribeye, Sue went for the small Fillet (8 oz!) Both were melt in the mouth delicious.
Best steak and nicest people you‚Äôll get. 100% recommend. Staff very helpful and full range of top notch steak
I came to KRico with my family and had one of the most memorable meals ever. Great food and excellent service. I will come anytime in a heart beat.
Meat is well presented, cooked to perfection service is outstanding very attentive staff great place for couples or family
Had the salmon frittata and it was *so* delicious -- Adam, the bartender, was very attentive and friendly, and the drinks he made were dangerously good. What a lovely surprise!
K Rico is the best South American steakhouse in New York, and give you the best service tho. And is an very nice restaurant.

Excellent trip advisor find!!! The petite filet was amazing!! Ambiance was perfect and the owner was very kind. Highly recommended when in the Hell‚Äôs Kitchen area. We stayed at the crowne plaza in Times Square and it was a short walk to get there!
Food and service was amazing ! Great place to dine before a night on the town. Just a couple of blocks away from all the Broadway shows so it‚Äôs fantastic for before or after for a memorable time.
Amazing restaurant, food is great and the service is excellent. It‚Äôs like dinning at home. I will definitely recommend this restaurant. We celebrated a birthday party and we had such a great time.
Best restaurant in Hell‚Äôs Kitchen! Love the service and the food. La parrillada yum!! Come for brunch on Sundays‚ú®

AMAZING!!! The atmosphere is warm and inviting. The staff are friendly and professional. The food is OUTSTANDING!!! The oysters are phenomenal and the steaks are PERFECTION!! K Rico is a MUST! We will definitely be back. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
Amazing steaks. Wonderful service. Executive chef explained the meats. Superb experience. Highly recommended. Absolutely beautiful ribeye and fillets.
We have been coming here for years and it is always the best steakhouse we have ever experienced. Their sides are to die for and definitely try the dessert.
This was our 2nd visit to K Rico and it surpassed our 1st visit. We both had the 14oz fillet mignon and I can say this is the best steak I have ever had. I would definitely recommend this restaurant.
nicely appointed, Argentinian feel, friendly and attentive servers and hostess and chef. Steaks were delicious, well prepared. Good menu choices, something for everyone. very good wine choices too.
Really enjoyed this meal! The steak blew us away and the service was first class! Keep doing what your doing K Rico!

column3: Make the time to eat at K Rico!
column4: Fantastic service, engaging and knowledgeable staff and management. We each enjoyed every course that was served. (The tomahawk was prepared to perfection.)
Landed at JFK, dropped bags at hotel and walked over here. Well worth the logistics! Excellent choice, great explanations. But couldn't manage a desert
We visited k Rico due to reading amazing reviews! An it did not disappoint! From food to the service was 5*. Definitely worth a visit!
Wonderful steak-dinner in NYC! Good price-quality of meat, Gently employers, the Restaurant is very clean. Good experience
What an amazing place in NYC. Great food, drinks and staff. This place puts all other steakhouses in NYC to shame. 6th trip in past 2 months and everyone has been amazing!
Second visit here, great steak, great service, not too pricey compared to some similar steak houses, can‚Äôt fault it, will return !!!
Great service, nice owner explaining every meat cut. Steaks good but not as great as at some other steakhouses.

Went in to have a solo steak dinner as a Christmas present to myself and was overwhelmed with hospitality from the bartender Tim. The food, from chef John Grecco, was superb and definitely will be back! Happy holidays to me and this fabulous steakhouse!
Fantastic food. Amazing service! Great location! We went here based on the reviews and they did NOT disappoint! The empanadas were amazing! The filet is to die for! Seriously, so now and eat here!

We loved the environment, the food, the service. Everything was made perfect. I chose the salmon even though we were in a beautiful steak restaurant, and boy it did not disappoint. Wonderful pairings and the appetizers were delicious. We would highly recommend this restaurant.
I went there on a busy thursday evening. The staff is very friendly and the filet mignon was one of the best I ever had. Thank you for your kind service and go ahead..
Top quality without stupid prices. Looked after like Kings and Queens by the knowledgable staff. Would unequivocally recommend

Everything was perfect! The atmosphere, the food, the service.... all exceptional. I had the K Rico sirloin and it came out with the Executive Chef. He gave us recommendations, and really enhanced the whole experience. Thanks to the staff!
On my wife birthday select this place and had an Excellent experience. The food and service was something over our expectations.

Great Service and food. We both got the Cod it was excellent. I ordered the tres leches for dessert also excellent. Cauliflower mash was interesting never had anything like it but that was good. I would go here again!
Awesome service and amazing food!!! I will definitely go back if I have the chance. Best meal experience in years.

column3: The best steak I‚Äôve ever had
column4: Went here on a Friday night and the food couldn‚Äôt have been better. So helpful. Would recommend everyone to go here when visiting the city.

column3: Great experience well worth a visit
column4: We wanted to try a genuine NYC steak house and K Rico‚Äôs did not disappoint. Food was excellent & Tommy‚Äôs personal showcase of the different cuts of meat was a highlight. Great atmosphere and service and the cheesecake was the best ever!
Thy best steakhouse in Manhattan for the zurita family! Great service and great food! When in NYC stop by Hell‚Äôs Kitchen #1 steakhouse KRICO-(how delicious)
I have been couple times this restaurant and have to say they have the best yucca fries I ever had not talking about the oven baked potatoes! So delightful!

Came here for a work party, completely blown away! I started with the octopus, so tender! For my main I had the ny strip, cooked to perfection. Thank you to Tommy the owner for explaining all the different cuts, what a great host. Highly recommend

We had a really excellent meal here for my husband‚Äôs 30th. The staff were really nice and spoilt us with a complimentary drink and a sparkler. The steak was amazing! The Wednesday post-theatre offer was reasonable.
We had a family dinner celebration. Staff was friendly and professional. Food was amazing. Great steak house with Latin fusion. Highly recommended!!! Definitely will be back for more.

column3: Great spot wish I lived closer
column4: Once again, the meal was outstanding. We never visit NYC without having dinner here. More then prime steaks on the menu with a great selection. The staff was attentive & friendly. Hell's Kitchen hot spot!
Delicious food and atmosphere. The Hispanic dishes make this restaurant unique. The flavors really complement each other, very delicious. Would definitely come back again.

Love this place! Went for dinner with my husband the ambience was great, the staff super friendly and accommodating, the food was simply outstanding! Highly recommend this place and I‚Äôm looking forward visiting K Rica soon!!
Really nice Steakhouse in Hell‚Äôs Kitchen, great service and fantastic food. This place has more of a modern feel to it than most other Steakhouses around the city.
Went to k.rico about a month ago with family and friends to celebrate a graduation. We had a great time . Delicious food, positive atmosphere, helpful staff, and great service.

Whenever I have a hankering for the best experience to celebrate an occasion, I always gravitate to K Rico. They have the best steak in the city and recipes you can't get anywhere else. We were treated like royalty and family.

column3: Best steaks we‚Äôve had in our lives!
column4: Best steaks we‚Äôve had in our lives! So good we ordered a 2nd round of steaks. Fantastic desserts and great service too
From the Blood Orange Cosmo to the Arepas and any entree you choose you are sure to have an amazing experience at KRico, they will treat you like royalty from start to finish!
Very pleasent service and excellent food, but somewhat expensive. The steak was perfect, served sizzling on a hot plate.

This place is newer, modern table/seat setting, fancy server presentation, and unique appetizer and steak with great sauce! Really great social spot for group of friends or after work socializing!! Highly recommend!
Best place in midtown! From the vibe of the restaurant, the food, the service, the management, everything overall is exceptional at K Rico!
Great food, great drinks, great service. Went here for a reunion with friends and couldn‚Äôt have picked a better spot. Highly recommend.
Excellent steakhouse in the middle of hells kitchen. Staffs were very attentive and full knowledge of the menu. Listen to the specials of the day. Portions were big for the value. We‚Äôll be back!

column3: Outstanding experience - best steakhouse in midtown! Excellent service, food and atmosphere.
column4: Excellent in every way. Food, service, atmosphere! A real gem in Hell‚Äôs Kitchen! Menu has wonderful variety - way beyond just the steaks, something for everyone.

Great service and food quality is incredible I recommend all the steaks are very good and the drinks are awesome it‚Äôs a great place to have dinner with family friends or even solo the vibes are always Welcoming and friendly.

column3: Meat lovers, this place is for you
column4: Very delicious pieces of meat, great service and good atmosphere. Special thanks to our waiter Benjamin who really took the time to guide us through the menu and to present us the different pieces of meat. We had a blast !

Found this place on trip advisor. It was really good, the food is excellent, the service was also excellent, special props to our waiter Benjamin who made sure we were perfectly attended. Would recommend to any meat lovers.
Quite by chance I found this gem of a steakhouse. I love the South American focus of the menu. Although a steakhouse, I loved the codfish. Sit in the al fresco area on the back.

column3: A good place for a good Steak
column4: We had the Thuesday Special, a Tomahawk Menue for two which cost 130 Dollar. It was great! Also the recommended Wine was fine. My doughter loved the Cheescake for Desert.

My first visit, but not my last. This restaurant had wonderful staff, excellent menu options, fair pricing, great food and desert. This is my go to restaurant for a nice environment and a way to relax with the perfect skirt steak.

This is my one of favorite restaurant in HK, every time I try something different from the menu and I know for sure I can‚Äôt go wrong because the food is exquisite so it is the wine selecci√≥n and the pisco sour. Simply Awesome
Excellentservice outstanding food.Waitrer was excellent and very attentive, steak was prepared properly and was a very good quality cut of meat. Highly recommend empire steak House
My husband and I had a great meal! The waiter was very knowledgeable and helpful with with advising us what to order to get the best experience.
Work nearby - a great standby for a good steak in a comfortable and unpretentious environment. Chef-driven, good food, good wine list. Staff is always friendly and professional.

We had a filet mignon and it was succulent! As welm as the sweet plantains. Be jamin, our server, was exceptional. He spoke many languages and can serve you in your language. He was very attentive and offered an amazing service!

Cooked to perfection! The chef is phenomenal. He adds his own flare to each steak and dish created. Not your average or typical steakhouse. Everyone is welcoming and very nice. Great ambiance. Lovely patio as well!
Great Welcome. Amazing food full of flavor. Amazing service. Thank you to Chef John for his passion.
Great place! The tomahawk is amazing if you decide to go, don‚Äôt miss out on this plate, plus the service is very good, always a good experience!
Totally delightful. From ambiance to food the place has no shortcomings. Worth coming to any. The atmosphere is most comfortable

Just finished. Such a great meal. Started with the best Pisco Sour I‚Äôve ever had. Appetizer was ceviche, followed by a delicious ribeye. The sides were incredible as well. Service was spectacular throughout. Definitely need to try this place.
Meat are espectacular, good wines, at a good price and with an outstanding service. I want to congratulate Javier for such a good service! Thanks!
Nice steakhouse, top Steaks ü•© and the best waiter ‚ÄûBenjamin‚Äú in town üëçwe booked a table online over Tripadvicer, perfectly
Great food and service, expensive but worth every penny, would definitely return if ever in nyc again
Great staff and the food was amazing and it came out fast! Great drinks , good energy. Definitely going back
Excellent place to enjoy great food with first quality of service. I will come back for sure. Christian Tanno es un grandioso anfitri√≥n.

We went there to celebrate a friend's birthday and it was a wonderful experience since the moment we got in. Service was high quality, and the food was unquestionably delicious. I would definitely recommend and go back in another occasion. Don't miss out!
I went there for a friend‚Äôs birthday & had a blast. The food was delicious. The best steaks in town. And cocktails too! Run, don‚Äôt walk there... ü§† -Edgar Sandoval

Excellent restaurant! Went there the other night with my mom and had the most amazing time. Exquisite food and high quality service! If you‚Äôre looking for a steak cooked to perfection, Krico is a must !

Good high quality food, exquisite service, Marco took great care of us, the co-owner was gracious and accommodating, and they allowed two of us who had a late lunch to split a steak. Quiet no rush perfect evening!

Such a wonderful night with a group of girlfriends at this establishment. Wait staff was attentive, food and drinks were delicious and served in a timely manner. I would definitely recommend K-Rico and be coming back when I‚Äôm in NYC again. A+
The food and service was amazing!! I personally ordered the the K Rico steak... perfectly seasoned. Thank you to Ricky and Javier
Must get the octopus for an appetizer and the steak presentation is super cool and informative ! There‚Äôs something there for everyone - this place is phenomenal .
Amazing food and unbelievable service. On top of the food and service, the ambience is incredible. Best restaurant in NYC!!
The service was fantastic, the best we have experienced in NYC. The best steak of my life! Will visit again when back in New York.

Such an enjoyable fun place, I can‚Äôt wait to go back, they certainly have something special going on! Appetizers, entrees and staff all exceeded my expectations, again. I was so excited to wake up and eat my leftovers ü§©

One of the best steaks we have ever ate! It was so worth the money! If you ever come to New York... ITS A MUST PLACE TO EAT!! You will NOT be disappointed! The service was always just as amazing! Highly recommend this place!!

I have been here twice with friends/family. The food (ie steaks) is delicious, the service friendly (not snooty for a steak restaurant) and the overall ambiance is laid back (similar to any steak restaurant in Latin America).

We visited this restaurant after reading the reviews on trip advisor. We were not disappointed. The service was excellent and our steaks, some of us had fillet, others had the New York sirloin, were superb. This restaurant is well worth a visit. Highly recommended.
The best steak in the world . I really enjoyed the tender flavor. I did not need any steak sauce. I cant wait to come back.
Great atmosphere and service The skirt steak is always great here The apps are really great Need rez the place fills up Have been here several times and will be back

column3: Excellent Service! The Owner and Manager are amazing.
column4: Mark and Lee greeted us at the door with such a friendly, funny demeanor and once we sat, the owner Tommy showed us our steak options. Impressive service and delicious menu. We loved it and hope to go back.
A pure delight. My wife and I plan on returning in the very near future. I would highly recommend this place.
Wanted a break from steak so I ordered cod fish with coconut lime dressing, and strawberries and papaya. It was just right balance of sweetness. They have nice creme br√ªl√©e too.
I have been to K. Rico for brunch and dinner and both were AMAZING! Could not ask for anything more...great food, great service! You have to give this place a try, you will not be disappointed!
Can't find a fault. Great food, great atmosphere, great staff, very professional with a touch of fun. Good for couples and family. Will be back in Summer to venture outside. See you soon!
One of the best steaks we have ever had. The cuts of meat brought out on show for approval before being cooked. Whole dining experience was first class. Would certainly recommend
Great spot nice love the steaks and especially the drink where on point not weak n not too strong just right shot out too the bartender who ever it is two thumbs up !!! Definitely will be back soon

Delicious dinner to celebrate our engagement. Perfect setting, very friendly staff and welcomed us with a complimentary champagne for our special occasion! Thanks K Rico, very much appreciated and something we will remember for the rest of our lives üòä
Not only was the staff all smiling they were attentative to our every need. The food was exaeptional ! We enjoyed our entire visit .

i don't usually give review to any restaurant but this one they deserve 5 stars, our waiter Clever was so nice all the time, respectful. the food was great for the price we pay we so happy to come back
Fantastic service, ambiance, and food! I love the churrasco! Great selection of wine as well. Top quality at a very affordable price. 2 thumbs up and highly recommend.

column3: Perfect match between amazing staff and marvelous food!
column4: Totally recommend this place, perfect spot for a before-the-show-dinner. The staff is so so charming and know their stuff - great food that is. Please don‚Äôt miss out on this gem!

Celebrated a family milestone at K Rico. Wonderful food. We loved the appetizers - empanadas, arepas, mussels - and oh the steak and surf/turf!! Also terrific, friendly and attentive service. Thanks K Rico for memorable family meal.
Real quality meals. This place is relaxed yet elevated and has wonderful quality meats. The steaks are amazing and the sides are just as good. Make sure you go hungry to do it justice.
The restaurant was excellent. We had quick and friendly service, the food was superb, and great wine list. Highly recommend this restaurant.
Truly a great night and will be back - the atmosphere, food and especially the service was terrific - did not disappoint.

Visited from the UK, the food was amazing and great to get a 14oz fillet as most in the UK are 8oz. Waiteres extremely friendly and knowlegeble, will certainly be coming back here on our nexy visit to NYC.

I have been to this amazing spot many times but this visit was special. Blackened strip rare on the bone. This monster gets taken back to kitchen to be sliced perfectly. Throw in the saut√©ed quinoa side, The blood orange margarita complements this killer meal.
The meat was delicious, very tasty and tender. And the portions are HUGE. Our waiter (Benjamin) was the best. Would definitely recommend !

Came across this little treasure after a special night of getting engaged on the top of the Empire. Fantastic service, incredible food with nothing being too much trouble, not even my request for pepper sauce .... a highly recommended accompaniment to the Devine steak.

I cannot say enough wonderful things about this restaurant. The food, unreal! The service, impeccable! As a foodie who has eaten in all types of restaurants all over the world...I cannot wait to come back!
The selection of meats was amazing and the fish selections were also excellent. Service was wonderful and the setting was great for an evening with friends.

Went with friends before a play. Got a full education on the types of steak. Amazing. Had the strip steak and it was fabulous. The celery salad and chopped salads were great. Bartender makes amazing drinks. Can‚Äôt wait to go back
One of best meals I remember in a long time. Service excellent. The grilled octopus is spectacular. Servings are huge and delicious.
Excellent steaks and apps, great service, same quality steaks as similar places at a slightly lower price.
The skirt steak was great but I have to say that the appetizers were even better esp the cevice Great service and clean facilities The place filled up quickly I recommend rez
Best environment, service,and food is delicious! Everyone is very attentive and professional! I recommend for any great occasion!

A fun and delicious Argentinian steak house in the Times Square area. Fabulous appetizers, sides, and drinks; great service; and a to-die-for selection of excellent steak cuts. Terrific for dates and for parties.
This was my fourth time at K Rico, and everytime it gets better and better. My wife and i will be in the City next month again. We will be dinning their again.
First visit to USA and were recommended this restaurant. We were astonished at the prices. Probably most expensive meal we have ever had. That said food and service were excellent.
Great steak House and excellent service by patrick who was friendly and knowledgeable, just one word of warning avoid the bar next door
This is authentic Argentinian food with excellent service. If you are with a group, the mixed grill was a large variety of good dishes, enough for at least 3 people.
Third time, no regret that's perfect place to have great meat. Thank you. Tres bon restaurant de viande. Allez y les yeux fermes.

Wow what a great find - lovely atmosphere and perfect food - great choice of steaks , great wine and fantastic desserts - staff are friendly and very attentive - highly recommended and the cheesecake is the best !!

Worst meal ever. Can't understand what other reviewers have seen here. All dishes were below average. First second and dessert. NY has a lot of great restaurants. This is not one of them. Over priced.Under standard. Don't go!
Another amazing evening with friends at K rico, menu options are plentiful, but don‚Äôt miss out on the Steaks, portions are always amazing and delicious, with a great wine list to match the food!!
Excelent service, exquisite tomahawk, great coctails. Try the bacon soup. A must if you are in New York.
Thanks to K Rico for a marvelous supper with steak. The wine and meat were fantastic. The chief from Ukraine is a good guy, he surprised us with a dessert for our special honeymoon evening in NY
I loved the place. The service is excellent and the food is unbeatable. Delicious cocktails. We were celebrating my bf birthday and they made it even more especial. I really recommend this place.

We chose this to be the place for my 40th birthday dinner. And the place did not let us down! The dry aged New York strip from their specials menu was awesome and also the service was top notch. Truly an evening to remember.

Wanted great steaks, got exactly that! Waiter was funny and very spontaneous, was a pleasure to be seated there. Setting is also nice. A tad too expensive for what it's worth, but overall a good experience.
We were for a weekend in NY, looking for a good food experience, this ribeye and NY strip -bourbon- was super. Service and scene was top Notch, would recommend to anyone!
The meat experience was memorable and we can recommend everything. We had a family dinner and we were all very surprised that it was so good.
Fabulous food and service - thanks Patrick! Fantastic waiter who was so informative and went out of his way to make our dining experience truly memorable on our visit all the way from NZ
We ordered the Ribeye & Filet Mignon both were cooked & presented beautifully. Couldn't fault the service 1st class, we sat outside which on a lovely warm NY night.

Booked a table for two after reading online reviews, and then shared a magnificently cooked Tomahawk ribeye steak. The wine by the glass was both excellent and affordable but the highlight ...? The freshly grated horseradish - do not go without it!

I have experienced almost every steak house in Manhattan and this place is by far the best. They age there own beef and butcher it as well. It helps that one of the owners is the Chef. He is very talented.
I went there with some classmates for our last dinner as students. Best choice ever!! Food was delicious, meat was perfectly grilled and the staff was amazing! Definitely recommended!

column3: The place to go for T bone steaks
column4: South American owned restaurant.... good choice in steaks, all sizes, Delicious... good service too.
Wonderful service and outstanding food! Would definitely go back. The pre fix theatre price is a great deal.
I went with my date and the bartender was espectacular! Her name was Z and she was absolutely the best bartender I have ever had. For any occasion always ask for her!
An affordable amazing food-experience. Try the house special Rico steak! Very friendly staff and the owner takes good care of you. Absolutely worth the trip. 5/5
Hands down the best steak my son and I have ever eaten and we love our steak! Salt pepper and a little rosemary all on an iron skillet. Get the cauliflower mash. It's incredible.

column3: One of the best steaks I‚Äôve ever had
column4: We visited K Rico based on the reviews on TripAdvisor and we weren‚Äôt disappointed. The steak was FANTASTIC, cooked perfectly. Tasty sides and friendly efficient staff. What‚Äôs not to love
Enjpyed a wonderful evening at K Rico. We were especially impressed with the waiter Adam. He was especially attentive and the service was fabulous. I would give him 5 stars!

Enjoyed a evening with my wife and K Rico did not disappoint. We sat outside on the patio, and some steaks and red wine, the menu was loaded with many food options and the wine to back it up, we will be back.
K Rico doesnt disappoint. The staff was superb, the steaks was superb. If you are in New York you need to visit this place!

I've had dinner here plenty of times and I'm never disappointed. The empanadas and ceviche are to die for. Also you must try the filet mignon is amazing. Service is on point and prompt. Love this place.
One week in NYC visited twice.....the fabulous steaks and attentive service was not the only reason to return. Great decor and atmosphere but great sides too. The most perfectly cooked plantain ever.
This was a really nice restaurant. I had that guacamole trio as an appetizer and really enjoyed the different flavors of guacamole. The steak was also top notch.
Probably the best steak I‚Äôve ever had. Great chips too. Service was good and all the staff were friendly.

Had the "on the bone sirloin steak" and it was probably one of the best steaks I've ever had. I sat at the bar and the bartender was extremely helpful and attentive. Recommended a phenomenal Malbec that paired perfectly with the wine. Would highly recommend!

I wanted to try a new brunch place for Pride and I was NOT disappointed! The bottomless brunch was incredible, as they would refill our margaritas non stop!!! Everyone on the staff was great, and our host was a delight from the start. Highly recommend!
We were a group of 10. Service was good. Food was excellent. Definitely recommend this restaurant!!!
I was there for dinner with my girlfriend and our childs. The meat was really fantastic and the desserts too. Absolutely raccomanded.
Excellent service. The food was great. I recommend it to friends, family and co-workers. Hopefully the construction in the front end soon.
Very good service ande fantastic meat. Ve had a very good time and visited twice the same week. Best meat our daughter ever eaten she says.
Excellent steaks!!! Great staff!! I would definitely go back again!!! Everything was great!!! Great reastaurant!!! Worth of money!!!
Very nice and good restaurant. nice frame, friendly, effective but discreet waiters. The better food experience we had in NYC
I was on a holiday with friends in NY. This was one of the best moments of my holiday !!! Next time in New York ... first dinner is there !!!
Had the 65oz steak to share ant it was perfect. Our waiter was fantastic and the whole set up spot on.

We dined here before going to the theater last week and were very pleased with our meals. The petite filet was done to perfection and both the Salmon and the Corvina were excellent! We highly recommend K Rico for dinner!!
Nice and relaxing garden at the backside, we had a nice brunch with reasonable taste, its worthed to try
Loved the food and the place, the service is excellent, the meat and drinks are perfect, great place in NYC

This steakhouse truly defines a South American experience of meat and fire! The tomahawk steak we ordered was flavorful and delicious. We devoured it with a baked potato and Brussel Sprouts. The appetizers were all served and presented wonderfully!

I concur with the positive reviews about the establishment. From the decor to the smallest menu items, everything was superb. Best to order many different items and encourage your group to share as you will want to sample everything on the menu.
Had an incredible filet and ribeye. The steamed veggies were great and the smashed sweet potatoes were amazing. The service was wonderful and prompt. Will eat here again. Good job Joshua-our server
the best Great atmosphere and really friendly informative staff. They explained and showed the steaks before you choose so you know what you are getting
The service was great. The food simply superb. They explained all the steaks in detail which just got bigger and bigger. The cocktails were excellent. Cannot recommend this place enough.

column3: Very nice brunch at K Rico
column4: We were looking for a restaurant to have brunch before a Broadway show and wanted to go somewhere that took reservations. We were seated promptly and enjoyed our brunch without being rushed out. I would recommend it.
The service was fantastic, the best we have experienced in NYC. The best steak of my life! Strongly recommend! Amazing!
Had a lovely evening here. Good steak, great wine and fantastic attentive service. Expensive, but you get what you pay for. Will visit again when back in New York.

We have been able to book a table a couple of hours before our visit. Quality of meat was very good (French fries have not been the best, but largely compensated by the meat). Service was nice, but not the quickest
Fantastic place. Sat outside at the back in the courtyard. A bit chilli but the food and service was amazing.
Delicious fine dining in midtown! From the first plate to dessert ... amazing!!! Very knowledgeable staff and impeccable service! Great wines and food was outstanding!!!

This place served one of the best steaks i have ever eaten! I highly recommend, if you‚Äôre in NYC give it a try, only a short walk from time square. (We went for the 52oz porterhouse for 2, simply excellent!)
The staff was very kind and the steaks were just gorgeous. I liked the shrimp cocktail too. I recommend that restaurant I everyone.
I had an exquisitely cooked steak and my wife had the Cod. AMAZING!! Followed it up with a delicious cheesecake. Combined with a great ambiance it‚Äôs a great place for a date.
You have to go here! Great menu and my boyfriend loved his steak. The staff were also really attentive. So glad we booked here. W0uld 100% go back!
Joshua helped us out and was amazing! Great service and generous drinks! The food was also great! Will be back next time I‚Äôm in nyc!
Had a great family meal was looked after by the owner John all night . Complimentary drinks after. Great food great service.

column3: The food was brilliant, and Joshua was the best!!!
column4: We had the best steak ever, but what made our evening was Joshua who created our experience with his superior knowledge of the steaks, his humour, and his beautiful heart!
Beautiful restaurant, attentive service, delicious food. Try the arepas appetizer! Eggs were perfectly done.
Steaks and sides were very tasty. Portions are quite big. Pricelevel was decent and service was good.
one of the best restaurants I've ever been to! just amazing! I chose the filet mignon, simply perfect. the service is first class. very friendly and courteous. many thanks
Great steaks in cosy and relaxed surroundings. Friendly staff, fair prices, visual introduction to the different steak types, just perfect!
Amazing restaurant, great food, charming ambiance and top notch service.(Adam was great) Located in popular Hell‚Äôs Kitchen near time square and theatre district. Will definitely be back again!
One of the best steak house I ever visit. Great service and top quality of food. I will definitely visit this restaurant again!

column3: Great food, drinks and bar fun!!!
column4: I‚Äôve come many times and usually sit at the bar with friends. The cocktails are great...try the blood orange cosmo! Good food with great service. Gigi always takes care of us and Chef John makes fabulous food.

We had dinner after our show and were planning on a prix fixes dinner but saw the amazing steaks on the way in. We got most expert advice and really outstanding service. We can only strongly recommend it!
First visit for us and loved the restaurant, really good staff and steaks were delicious. Great location and great price.

Once again the K Rico delivered when it comes to an impressive atmosphere and even better cuisine when you need to entertain for business! You just can‚Äôt wrong here for a reliable place to deliver the ambience and food to enhance business relationships!
Had a wonderful dinner at this restaurant. The food was great, the staff very attentive and even got a surprise Birthday cake at the end of the meal!
Great menu selection. Excellent food. Service was perfect, attentive and friendly. Good value, would definitely visit again and highly recommend.
Fantastic service the food was excellent. I would recommend k rico to any one that is a meat lover. I would love to thank the amazing and humble chef. This is the best food in NYC.
Absolutely delicious best steak that I‚Äôve had in a long time. Staff were great very helpful and the atmosphere was nice.
Very good restaurant with good product and nice people. Be careful the size of meat is enormous... but so good
Excellent dinner and drinks, slight hiccup on one of the dishes but was quickly rerectified. Fantastic steaks all round and the best ribeye I‚Äôve had. Highly recommend.
Truly number 1 steakhouse in NY. Food was very delicious with a nice ambiance. Me and my colleague enjoyed our food with a refreshing drink. Well done K rico!!!
Excellent food and service. Owner came to the table was friendly and genuine. 10/10 would recommend.

column3: Life's best steak I ever had
column4: I've visit alone, but the bartender&server made me feel 'Not alone'. Best serviece i've ever had & best fillet mignon in my life Thxu
This place really has great service and great food....one of my favorite spots to go to for dinner. Highly recommended
My niece and i enjoyed mussels and our entrees - steak and pork. Gigi and Javier crushed it. Dessert was great too! Xoxo
We had an amazing meal at K Rico that included roasted oysters, grilled octopus and skirt steak. Everything was cooked perfectly and it was quiet and cozy. Can‚Äôt wait to go again
Manager has issues with costumer service. Brunch at 3.30 pm on a Saturday wasn't a big deal. Nice ambience and a friendly waiter. That's about it.
The best steak I have ever had The Tomahawk steak were so big you could feed three people with one. We had the grilled octopus which was so tender and tasty
The best steak I have ever had! The owner and chef came out and spoke to us during the meal which was lovely. A genuine NYC highlight for me in our 6 night visit from Scotland
The porterhouse was incredible. The service and atmosphere were also very good. Not cheap, but worth every penny.

column3: Great mussels (appetizer)And the filet was amazing!!
column4: Loved the sauce on the mussels-truly amazing!! And the filet was done PERFECTLY (at least for me who thinks ‚Äúmedium-rare‚Äù is the ONLY way to have a good piece of beef)
Perfect service, perfect food, perfect location... We had steaks and fish and it was amazing. It‚Äôs like god put his hand in to your mouth. We highly recommend it.
Th√© Fabulous taste steak part New York City S√≥crates Dur√£es Nice Oyster claims delicius Empanadas The Top
One of the best rib-eye i have ever had! Great place, fantastic atmosphire, great service!! The best value for money in new york Well recomended
Well you sure do get a choice of steaks all USDA Prime. If you love steak then eat here. Though the steaks were great the red sangria knocked my socks off. It was amazing!

The service was good and the steak portions were large. The steak was cooked nicely and the salad was tasty. Good size shrimp on the shrimp cocktail. Tables are very close together but the noise level was not unbearable.
Small and familiar space (book in advance), very good service, nice latin music, and excellent food... a ‚Äúlatino‚Äù cuisine with very special meats... very good place
Highly recommended to anyone who is looking for simply the BEST cuts of STEAK in NYC along with a great wine selection. Amazing atmosphere and service!
What a perfect way to end a long day in New York. Great food with a wonderful atmosphere. Highly recommended!

While staying in NYC for a conference, we were fortunate enough to find this little hot spot and had a late night dinner. The food was GREAT and our server was fantastic! If you are in the area, I would highly recommend it!

Made reservations strictly on Trip Advisor reviews. The service was fantastic. Bloody Mary‚Äôs - spicy! Guacamole trio - amazing. Homemade butter for French toast - delicious. Steak and eggs - so good.

Enjoyed a great dinner at K Rico. Service was impeccable. The food outstanding. Would definitely go back to try another dish. Had the octopus and cerviche and a sirloin for dinner. Cooked just right. Thanks for a wonderful dining experience.
This restaurant serves very delicious meats and Latino dishes. The service was great and the flavors delicious. We recommend it.
I have eaten at many steak houses in. Y travels. K Rico has by far the most perfect New York strip ever. Compliments to the chef, top rating in my book

What a cracking experience Superb and quick on line booming process, fantastic greeting on entering tje restuarant. Waiters dressed smart excellent service. Food was sublime hot and extremely pleasing to the eye and the taste buds. We will return again
We had an amazing dinner at K Rico. Amazing steak (on an extemely hot plate!) with very nice chimichury sauce. Would sure come back here. Prices are very good aswell.

column3: Very nice ambiance with excellent food!
column4: When you book ask for a table away from the front door....the food is unique in presentation and overall excellent...well priced for the amazing quality! I will go back again...
Great steak. Great service. Great price. Also comparison to other steak house. I like this is the best

Unlike the majority of highly enthusiastic reviewers I have criticism. Yes, it is a very pleasant place, cheerful and boisterous. Service is friendly. However, for a truly expensive South American steakhouse I found the meat very disappoining: tough and not especially tasty.
Definitely recommend this place! Awesome service.. location is great.. food is amazing and ask for Andrew!! Hands down best server ever. Thank you Andrew service was exceptional!

column3: Fantastic meal for last night in NYC
column4: Fantastic end to holiday. Steaks were cooked perfectly, which was great given the size of them; they were HUGE! Joshua was a fantastic waiter‚Ä¨ and very friendly. Made us feel very welcome. Wholeheartedly recommend and will return when in New York again.
Flawless service! Great cocktails too. Appetizers and entrees were delicious. We ordered the parrillada, octopus, empanadas, beat salad. Will definitely come back. It was the best meat on out trip.
Everything was wonderful. The menu was amazing- going back to order what others in my party had and raved about.
We came here for a meal before a show on Broadway. Dining here is an experience not a meal. Excellent service, excellent steaks and great wine. I don't really need to say much more!
Best service in town .. good teamwork .. great atmosphere .. high class steaks .. very good location .. fair prices .. i liked it .. definitely 5 stars !

column3: 4 and one half stars for us .
column4: The restaurant is quite expensive but the food quality and service is first class . The only downside for us, as a couple with European sized appetites, is that they didn't handle shared dishes as well as many other restaurants we used .

Great restaurant with unique touch. Food was delicious. Great plate presentation, wonderful plates. The ambience of the restaurant was wonderful. This restaurant is a must for lovers of good taste. Viva K Rico!

column3: Really good steaks - but slightly overpriced
column4: The steak was really good, but not perfect. I've had better steaks for half the price in the US. Still, the staff was extremely friendly, so it was a nice experience.
We loved this restaurant. The steaks were beautiful, melt in mouth and cooked to perfection. The atmosphere and cocktails were also great, highly recommended.

column3: One of the best steaks ever!
column4: Unbelievable steak and great service! Special thanks to Joshua, who took good care of us and ensured we had a lovely evening :)More

column3: Really good steaks - but slightly overpriced
column4: The steak was really good, but not perfect. I've had better steaks for half the price in the US. Still, the staff was extremely friendly, so it was a nice experience.

Orgasmic!!!!!!! By far this is the best dinner!!!!! There are no words to describe the best of the best! The service was excellent! Every bite set my taste buds on fire- exhilarating-titillating-and beyond!! We ordered thee chopped salad and porter house with the cauliflower potatoe mash and sweet potatoe mash---ended with the tres leches. We got to hug the head chef! The wait staff was friendly and blessed us with a gift!  If you don't try this place you won't know the definition of amazing!!!! Thank you K Rico Aloha and Mahal nui loa!
We loved this restaurant. The steaks were beautiful, melt in mouth and cooked to perfection. The atmosphere and cocktails were also great, highly recommended.
Went there the other night with five of my friends. The food and service was amazing. Highly reccomened!
We shared three dishes (see below). All were excellent, the service was fabulous and the music made the ambiance wonderful.
Absolutely appetizing. Would definitely come again. Filet Mignon was absolutely wonderful...I finished the whole steak.

Highly recommend this place. The staff is incredibly attentive and the food is delicious! We shared a bunch of appetizers (guacs, empanadas, arepas, & grilled octopus) and for dinner I had the filet mignon. The grilled octopus was out of this world and the filet was cooked perfectly! The seasoning on the filet was delightful, you could SMELL the rosemary. Their blood orange cosmo was the perfect starter! If your in the city and looking for a place to go, K Rico is definitely a go to!
I got the skirt steak and it was delicious! Get the cauliflower mash it is smooth and fabulous!! Service was incredible and the owners are so friendly!
Excellent food and such amazing service! Cute environment!!! Best steakhouse in NYC, loved everything about this definitely will come back!
Had mussels appetizer and skirt steak, both were amazing! Great service and atmosphere! Will definitely be back!
Lovely friendly staff who really looked after us, and the steak was fantastic and beautifully cooked.
Came for my 55th birthday dinner with my sister and my daughter. Service was great and the food was better. Really stellar all the way around. Would love to come back!
Such and amazing place to visit. The bartender Diego is hands down one of the best in the city. Such precision. Very informative. But let's not forget the steaks. üòçüòçüòçüòç I'll be back!!

column3: excellent south american steakhouse in new york city.
column4: my friend and i had a great lunch at k rico. the food was flavorful and cooked just right. the service was outstanding. i will recommend going back again to k rico.
Superb meal, the steak was excellent. The service very friendly and efficient and the ambience good.
Lovely restaurant with great food,good location and very helpful staff.At the back is a small outside area which was hot and sunny for lunch outside
Really good meat, very attentive personnel. A bit pricey, which is common for New York. Overall good experience, recommendable!
Nice atmosphere. Great Margarita (s) wonderful Corn cakes, great steaks good choice if wines well worth a visit
Small Hell's Kitchen restaurant serving the Chef's selection of South American specialties with a strong focus on Prime wet and dry aged beef. Really delicious. Will return next visit to NYC.
Best steak I have ever had! Great service and atmosphere, would definitely recommend, cheesecake was yummy too!
Excellent service!!! Filet mignon perfection!!! I loved the pre-dinner talk given by the charming chef/owner about the merits of beef.
Loved the brunch here. It has more than traditional options. Ambiance was nice too. Planning to go back to try the steak. Highly recommended.
Amazing Brunch. Excellent drinks. Food and staff are off the charts. And the atmosphere is special. Highly recommend. üëçüëçüëçüëçüëç

column3: Had a GREAT dinner here last night. THANK YOU
column4: I had the steak here and loved it. Very good. I'll be coming back next time I visit NYC for business.

Headed to K Rico tonight before heading to see a Broadway Show, had the filetito and my husband had the New York strip steak. Amazing! The steaks were cooked to perfection and the sides were amazing. Thank you
Very good food in a relaxed, slow pace. HUGE portions - a 62 oz steak? Look out for the charges for water - $10 a bottle is a bit steep in my opinion.
Had dinner with two friends. Staff was extremely attentive and the food was great. Definitely going back for the tomahawk steak
This restaurant is well worth a visit if you like your steak. Cooked to perfection with great service from all the staff.

Lovely atmosphere, good selection on the menu, service from our waiter was perfect, he advised on foods and explained different ingredients and how food was cooked. Wine was fab and not over priced, you really can't go wrong with a meal here!!
Had a filet which was very tasty. Waiter seemed new and did not want to halt conversation to take orders, etc. Fair wine selection, and ok location, as it was about a 6 block walk from times square.

column3: The best stake house in nyc!!
column4: K Rico is a simple and delicious south American restaurant. We shared a stake, a salad and a side dish. It was more than enough. The service was very good.. Will definitely be back!!
Delicous Otopus appetizer, soupa and skirt steak!! Our waiter Luis was the absolute best; friendly, fun, professional and so very attentive. A must try.
Nice place, good atmosphere, excellent tomahawk beef, efficient. We got served and taken care of by Louis who did an excellent job together with the other members of the staff
Seasoned, tender steaks and mixed grill. Attentive wait staff....This was our first visit this past Saturday evening.... Charming venue
Just come in and appreciate the South American mood of the place ! And then try the big piece of meat, awesome. I will come back, gracias
I was not impress. However, the restaurant does deliver an ok piece of meat. In my view, I am fully aware this is New York but the service was not up to par and the food was not top quality.
Terrific pre-theater menu. $36 for three courses. You must show theater tickets for that night and ask because it is not in the menu.
Everything was great- from the good service to dessert. Had a ceviche that was to die for, followed by cheese fundu and then a "parillada de carne" or a Meat fest. Will return again
Dined here after attending a Broadway show. We throughly enjoyed our meals and would return again. Steaks were done perfect.

I am in culinary heaven!! Amazing from start to finish. Filet Mignon melts in your mouth, Cod incredibility refreshing. Did I mention the dessert? The chocolate mousse and cheese cake were incredible. Thank you Alejandro for the wonderful service!

column3: Must visit for food and drinks
column4: Great restaurant, food and cocktails are top shelf and service was amazing. Had lunch with colleagues and can't wait to go back!!
